ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mages soloing..... err Grouping?
ygData.msgSnippet: Specific instances are not coming to mind at the moment, but I can say I have actually had more positive (or at least neutral) group experiences with mages
ygData.messageBody:
Specific instances are not coming to mind at the moment, but I can say I
have actually had more positive (or at least neutral) group experiences
with mages than I have negative. Then again, I have so seldom grouped
with mages in the last year+ that maybe I just got lucky.

Only reoccuring beef I have had with them are ones who do not understand
that Earth pets interfere with snaring when in critical positions.

/g Train passing, make sure that thing is snared
Jabobn begins to cast a spell
/g Ack, no, not the pet!
LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...
/gu Hey, could someone TP me back to Kunark? No res
XXX tells the guild 'Geez, woman, collar that pet! I am getting sick of
TPing your butt every ten minutes ;P'
ZZZ tells the guild 'Keep group with that mage, Kar...you might be low
enough to group with me again soon :)'

::grins::

-Karisma Swiftarrow
Guildmistress, Hearts of Valor
http://www.heartsofvalor.com

Visit Swiftarrow's Song at http://www.freespeech.org/karisma
